message: Good day Bob, I have a premium product that I believe you might be interested in. I'm offering it to you for $2000000.
Alice, your product sounds interesting, but $2000000 is way out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $800000 for it, which is the maximum I can afford. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, after careful consideration, I'm willing to lower my price to $1600000. This is a fair price for the value and quality of the product. I hope we can make a deal at this price.

Alice, $1600000 is still a bit high for me.  While I understand the product's value, I'm really pushing my budget at $800000. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
